features: Soothes Sensitive Skin: NIVEA shave gel for men soothes sensitive skin and protect against shaving irritation
Fights Shaving Irritation: This beard shaving gel for men fights irritation from shaving, burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness and stubble itch
Improves Razor Glide: A men's shave gel that improves razor glide and softens the stubble for a comfortable, close shave
Vitamin E and Chamomile Enriched: NIVEA shaving gel enriched with Vitamin E, natural Chamomile extract and Witch Hazel extract to care for your skin while you shave
Includes three (3) 7 ounce cans of NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Gel
body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Gel. This shave gel is specially formulated for men with sensitive skin, to soothe skin and help protect against shaving irritation. NIVEA Sensitive Shave Gel for Men is enriched with Vitamin E, and soothing Chamomile and Witch Hazel extracts to care for your skin while you shave. Great as an alternative to shaving cream, this shave gel helps to fight the five signs of shave irritation: burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness and stubble itch, for visibly healthy-looking skin. Featuring Skin Guard technology, this sensitive shave gel improves razor glide to help protect against nicks and cuts. It also softens stubble for a comfortable, close shave. You can feel good about using this sensitive shaving gel since it is alcohol free and dye free, making it safe for everyday use. A daily shave gel is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN Sensitive Post Shave Balm and Sensitive Face Moisturizer as part of a daily skincare regimen. To use, pump men's shaving gel onto fingertips and massage directly onto face to form a rich, creamy lather.

Can you use this shaving gel with an electric razor? The NIVEA MEN shaving gels are not meant to be used with an electric razor. What is the color of this shaving gel? The NIVEA MEN Sensitive Cool Shaving Gel is bluish. It comes out light blue, and white from the foam as it forms. What does it mean that this shaving gel is free from drying alcohol? This NIVEA MEN shaving gel is free from drying alcohol, which means that it hydrates your skin and softens stubble for a close, comfortable shave. What ingredients are in this shaving gel?​ You can find a full list of the ingredients in NIVEA MEN Sensitive Shave Gel on the back of the bottle and in the product images located at the top of this page. Has the formula of this shaving gel changed? NIVEA MEN has been researching the best, safest and most effective skincare formulas for more than 100 years. We regularly analyze our existing formulas and make improvements as needed to ensure all products meet the highest quality standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shaving Luxury in a Can: Rich Lather Meets Feisty Canister
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR: Luxurious lather, a dab goes a long way, canister control could be better, top-notch shaving experience.Dive into the world of lavish lathers with this shaving cream – it's like the cream of the crop in the shaving world. This stuff is like the fine champagne of shaving creams; a little pop and you're awash in foam. You need just a smidge, and it froths up like a dream. But be warned, a heavy-handed press on the canister, and you're looking at a Mount Everest of cream – way more than needed for a single shave.The canister is like a high-spirited stallion – powerful but could use a bit more finesse in the control department. I sometimes wish I had the precision of a pastry chef decorating a cake, doling out the perfect amount each time.But let's talk performance – this shaving cream is like the VIP in the world of smooth shaves. It glides on like silk, making your razor's job feel like a glide across ice.In summary, if you're in the hunt for a shave that feels more like a luxury spa treatment, this is your ticket. Just a heads-up – mastering the canister's enthusiasm is part of the adventure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has got to be one of the best shaving gels you will find, just a small amount creates a lot of lather, not too watery, not too thick, scent is just right., and the 3pk is a great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very smooth shave. It says lets you shave less often, but I found shaving more often is easier wth this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well and helps with shaving
reviews.reviewText: Works well for sensitive skin. Have only had one ingrown hair/whisker while using this. Good product as I like to shave with a hand razor much more than any of the electrics I've tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have been using this sensitive shave gel for years
reviews.reviewText: What a few products I am ran loyal to, despite having a sensitive face I never seem to have a problem. I'm not sure the chemicals used and maybe one day it will search for alternatives. But as of now I have no intention of changing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 pack is a great deal
reviews.reviewText: My favorite shaving gel. With the 3 pack I got 3 for less than the cost of 2 at the local drugstore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this shaving cream gel; just as advertised and great price; fast delivery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Irritation be gone
reviews.reviewText: I spent years being partial to Gillette shaving gel, and tried this stuff on a whim. No way I'm going back - it just does a better job when shaving. I'm not particularly sensitive to smells, but I feel like this gel is pretty neutral, which is fine by me.
Bon produit et reçus dans les temps donner

reviews.reviewTitle: Angenehm und gut verträglich für mich

reviews.reviewText: By far the best shaving gel. Comfortable and very good value for money.
